statements: SELECT supporter_id, first_name, last_name, email, age, gender, location, interests, engagement_level FROM supporters;
SELECT * FROM supporters WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, location FROM supporters WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT supporter_id, first_name, email, location FROM supporters ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT supporter_id, first_name, location, interests FROM supporters WHERE engagement_level = 'high';
SELECT supporter_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM supporters WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supporters WHERE location = 'New York' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT supporter_id, first_name, interests FROM supporters WHERE gender = 'Male' AND (age BETWEEN 20 AND 30) ORDER BY supporter_id DESC;
SELECT supporter_id, last_name, engagement_level FROM supporters WHERE age >= 40 AND (location LIKE '%CA%' OR location LIKE '%NY%') ORDER BY engagement_level ASC;
SELECT supporter_id, email, gender FROM supporters WHERE interests LIKE '%environment%' AND engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT supporter_name, engagement_level FROM supporters WHERE supporter_id = 1
SELECT * FROM supporters WHERE supporter_id IN (2, 3)
SELECT supporter_id, supporter_name, engagement_level FROM supporters WHERE engagement_level > 3
SELECT supporter_id, supporter_name, interests FROM supporters WHERE interests ->> 'category' = 'Tech'
SELECT * FROM communications ORDER BY communication_date DESC
SELECT supporter_name, engagement_level FROM supporters WHERE supporter_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM supporters WHERE demographics->>'age' = '30' AND interests @> '{"category": "sports"}';
SELECT s.supporter_name, c.content FROM supporters s JOIN communications c ON s.supporter_id = c.supporter_id WHERE c.communication_type = 'email' ORDER BY c.communication_date DESC;
SELECT supporter_name, engagement_level FROM supporters WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY supporter_name ASC;
SELECT supporter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM communications GROUP BY supporter_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_communications DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM supporters_demographics
SELECT hobby, interest_category, level_of_interest FROM supporters_interests
SELECT last_engagement_date, number_of_engagements, preferred_communication_method FROM supporters_engagement
SELECT supporter_id, name, location FROM supporters_demographics
SELECT supporter_id, last_engagement_date, preferred_communication_method FROM supporters_engagement
SELECT * FROM supporters_demographics;
SELECT supporter_id, name, age, gender, location FROM supporters_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT supporter_id, name, age, gender, location FROM supporters_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT s.name, i.hobby, i.interest_category FROM supporters_demographics s INNER JOIN supporters_interests i ON s.supporter_id = i.supporter_id;

SELECT s.name, e.last_engagement_date, e.number_of_engagements FROM supporters_demographics s INNER JOIN supporters_engagement e ON s.supporter_id = e.supporter_id WHERE e.preferred_communication_method = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM supporters_demographics;
SELECT supporter_id, first_name, last_name FROM supporters_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT supporter_id, age, city, gender FROM supporters_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT supporter_id, interest FROM supporters_interests WHERE supporter_id = 1;
SELECT supporter_id, segment FROM supporters_segmentation WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT supporter_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender, city FROM supporters_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT * FROM supporters_interests WHERE interest='Technology'
SELECT supporter_id, last_engagement_date, engagement_score FROM supporters_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC
SELECT supporter_id, segment FROM supporters_segmentation WHERE segment='VIP'
SELECT supporter_id, first_name, last_name, city FROM supporters_demographics WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT supporter_id, age, gender, location FROM demographics;
SELECT hobby, interest_category FROM interests WHERE supporter_id = 1;
SELECT supporter_id, last_interaction_date, interaction_type FROM engagement ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT supporter_id, segment_description FROM segmentation WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT communication_id, communication_type FROM communications WHERE supporter_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM demographics ORDER BY age DESC, location ASC;
SELECT supporter_id, gender FROM demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT supporter_id, hobby FROM interests WHERE interest_category = 'Sports' ORDER BY supporter_id ASC;
SELECT supporter_id, last_interaction_date FROM engagement WHERE interaction_count > 5;
SELECT supporter_id, segment_description FROM segmentation WHERE segment = 'VIP';
